category.name: Classification
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: ICS_synchronize_automatically
preference.preference_description: Enables automatic synchronization of Classification data to the sites specified in the ICS_synchronize_sites preference. Valid Values: True - Classification hierarchy data is automatically shared to the selected sites whenever the data is saved. False - Classification hierarchy data is not shared to the selected sites whenever the data is saved.
